metadata.description: This data is the magnetism, grain size, chromaticity, diffuse reflectance spectral goethite / hematite peak height data, organic matter stable carbon isotope data of loess-paleosol sequence in Ganzi section (XS) in the east of Tibetan Plateau (TP). We measured the magnetic susceptibility and grain size of the section (10 m) at an interval of 2.5 cm, measured the non-hysteresis remanence and isothermal remanence data at an interval of 5 cm, and provided 5 sets of hysteresis loop measurement results. Total organic carbon (TOC) and organic carbon isotopes were measured at 10 cm and 20 cm intervals respectively. The experimental analysis of magnetic susceptibility was completed at the Key Laboratory of Western China's Environmental Systems (Ministry of Education), Lanzhou University, China. The soil δ13Corgmeasurements were conducted at the State Key Laboratory of Grassland Agro-ecosystems (SKLGAE), Lanzhou University. And the analysis of remanence and hysteresis loop was completed at the Institute of Tibetan Plateau Research, Chinese Academy of Sciences. Chromaticity analysis was carried out in the State Key Laboratory of Loess and Quaternary Geology. The magnetic susceptibility is measured by Bartington MS2 magnetic susceptibility meter, the non-hysteresis remanence is measured by American ASCIM-10-30 pulse magnetometer and molspin minispin small rotation magnetometer, and the isothermal remanence is measured by ASCIM-10-30 pulse magnetometer, 2g-755 superconducting magnetometer and JR-6A rotation magnetometer; he grain size data were measured by a Malvern Mastersizer 2000 laser diffractometer; The chromaticity was determined by CM-700d spectrophotometer. The δ13Corgvalues were analyzed using a MAT-253 isotope ratio mass spectrometer. This data provides an understanding of the magnetic properties and chromaticity variation characteristics of the loess sequence in the eastern TP since the last interglacial period, and plays an important role in the research of the paleoenvironment and paleoclimate in the eastern TP and its relationship with the surrounding atmospheric circulation.
metadata.descriptionCn: 本数据为青藏高原东部甘孜新市（XS）黄土-古土壤序列的磁学数据、粒度数据、色度数据、漫反射光谱针/赤铁矿峰高数据、有机质稳定碳同位素数据。我们按照2.5 cm间隔测量该剖面（10 m）的磁化率和粒度数据，5cm间隔测量无磁滞剩磁和等温剩磁数据，同时提供5组磁滞回线测量结果。分别按照10 cm 和20 cm间隔测量该剖面总有机碳（TOC）和有机碳同位素。磁化率实验分析在兰州大学西部环境教育部重点实验室完成，剩磁和磁滞回线分析实验在中国科学院青藏高原研究所大陆碰撞和高原隆升重点实验室古地磁实验室完成。色度分析在黄土与第四纪地质国家重点实验室进行。磁化率使用Bartington MS2型磁化率仪测定，无磁滞剩磁使用美国ASCIM-10-30脉冲磁力仪和Molspin Minispin小旋转磁力仪测定，等温剩磁使用ASCIM-10-30型脉冲强磁仪、2G-755超导磁力仪和JR-6A旋转磁力仪测定；粒度数据使用Malvern Mastersizer 2000激光粒度仪测定；色度和漫反射光谱使用CM-700d分光光度计测定。采用MAT-253同位素比值质谱仪对样品的δ13Corg进行测定。该数据提供了青藏高原东部地区末次间冰期以来的黄土序列的磁学性质和色度变化特征的认识，对研究青藏高原东部黄土古环境、古气候研究及其与周边大气环流之间的联系具有重要的作用。

background: The stable carbon isotope (δ13Corg) composition of soil organic matter (SOM) is closely related to vegetation and soil pedogenic processes and is one of the main tools used to understand the component processes of the terrestrial carbon cycle. As the δ13Corg composition of a given plant is controlled by the environmental conditions as well as the vegetation type, the δ13Corg composition of loess–paleosol sequences has been widely used as a valuable indicator to reconstruct past environments and the paleoecology of the Chinese Loess Plateau (CLP) and other regions. Numerous studies have shown that the δ13Corg values in paleosols are more positive than those in loess deposits. However, in eastern and southeastern Europe, central Asia, and the northwestern CLP, the loess δ13Corg values exhibit opposite patterns with more negative values during paleosol periods than those during loess accumulation periods since the last interglacial (LIG). The Tibetan Plateau (TP) has a strong influence on regional and global climate change due to its large area and high elevation. Aeolian loess is widely distributed on the TP and provides a crucial archive for understanding the evolution of the Indian monsoon and paleoenvironments of the TP. It has been inferred from a large dataset of the δ13C composition of modern soils on the TP that the mean annual precipitation (MAP) and mean annual temperature (MAT) are the main factors controlling the distribution of vegetation type on the TP, which causes the variation in δ13C composition of modern soils at any given altitude.
research objective: We conducted detailed δ13Corg and total organic carbon analyses of the Ganzi loess sequence on the eastern TP since the last interglacial (LIG). In the present research, we choose a typical loess section near Ganzi County on the eastern TP for detailed δ13Corg analysis. By combining our results with other environmental proxies, we discuss the variation characteristics of loess δ13Corg values during the last glacial–interglacial cycle and its environmental implications. The results of this study will deepen our understanding of the evolution of the paleoenvironment on the eastern TP.
methods: The studied section was the XS section (99°59′E, 31°37′N), which is located in the northwestern region of Ganzi County at an elevation of 3400 m above sea level (a.s.l). Five samples for optically stimulated luminescence (OSL) dating were taken by hammering stainless steel tubes into the fresh outcrop near the stratigraphic boundary. Bulk samples were collected at 2.5 cm intervals for the subsequent measurement of paleoenvironment proxies. For the samples taken at a depth of 1 m, 3 m, and 5 m, medium quartz grains (38–63 μm) were purified for OSL dating and were prepared following the methods of Lai et al. (2007). Quartz OSL dating with a standard single aliquot regenerative-dose protocol was performed using a Lexsyg research automatic TL/OSL reader at the Laboratory of the Institute of Mountain Hazards and Environment, Chinese Academy of Sciences. For the two bottom samples with depths at 7.5 m and 10 m, the quartz luminescence signal was close to saturation, which would have led to the underestimation of the ages of the samples. Thus, the post-infrared (IR)–IR stimulated luminescence (SL) (pIR–IRSL) dating on coarse grains of K-rich feldspar were conducted using an automated Risø TL/OSL reader at Lanzhou University. The soil δ13Corg measurements were conducted at the State Key Laboratory of Grassland Agro-ecosystems (SKLGAE), Lanzhou University. Before measurement, all air-dried loess samples were ground into a uniform size powder (>200 mesh) after removal of modern rootlets. Subsamples of ~3 g were treated with 10% hydrochloric acid (HCl) for 24 h to remove inorganic carbon completely and then oven-dried at 40 °C after thorough rinsing with distilled water. Subsequently, 3–5 mg subsamples were weighed and placed in a tin cup for analysis. Total organic carbon (TOC) and magnetic susceptibility (MS) measurements were carried out at the Key Laboratory of Western China’s Environmental Systems (Ministry of Education), Lanzhou University. Diffuse reflectance spectra (DRS) were measured at the Institute of Earth Environment, Chinese Academy of Sciences, in Xi'an.
findings: The δ13Corg values of loess during glacial periods were lower than those during interglacial periods, with more negative values associated with the cold stages since the LIG on the eastern TP. The reconstruction of vegetation from the δ13Corg data indicated that C3/C4 mixed vegetation was dominated by C3 vegetation, and that the relative abundance of C4 vegetation during the glacial stages was much lower than that during MIS 5 and MIS 3. The high relative abundance of C4 plants during MIS 5 and MIS 3 suggested an increased proportion of C4 plants during the warm period. Since the LIG, the change in the abundance of C3/C4 vegetation in the Ganzi region has been mainly controlled by climate change at the glacial–interglacial scale. The combined effect of temperature, precipitation, and atmospheric CO2 caused changes in the paleovegetation on the eastern TP.
backgroundCn: 土壤有机质（SOM）的稳定碳同位素（δ13Corg）组成与植被和土壤成土过程密切相关，是理解陆地碳循环组成过程的主要工具之一。由于特定植物的δ13Corg组成受环境条件和植被类型的控制，黄土-古土壤序列的δ13Corg组成被广泛用作重建过去环境和中国黄土高原（CLP）及其他地区古生态的重要指标。许多研究表明，古土壤中的δ13Corg值比黄土沉积物中的值更为正。然而，在东欧和东南欧、中亚以及西北CLP地区，自上一个间冰期（LIG）以来，黄土的δ13Corg值在古土壤时期表现出与沉积黄土时期相反的模式，即古土壤时期的值比沉积黄土时期的值更为负。青藏高原（TP）由于其广阔的面积和高海拔，对区域和全球气候变化有着强烈的影响。风成黄土在青藏高原广泛分布，为理解印度季风的演变和青藏高原的古环境提供了重要的档案。从青藏高原现代土壤的δ13C组成的大量数据推断，年均降水量（MAP）和年均气温（MAT）是控制青藏高原植被类型分布的主要因素，这导致了在任何给定海拔高度上现代土壤δ13C组成的变化。
research objectiveCn: 我们对东青藏高原甘孜黄土剖面进行了详细的δ13Corg和总有机碳分析，研究时间范围自上一个间冰期（LIG）以来。在本研究中，我们选择了位于甘孜县的一个典型黄土剖面进行详细的δ13Corg分析。通过将我们的结果与其他环境指标相结合，我们讨论了在上一个冰川-间冰期循环中黄土δ13Corg值的变化特征及其环境意义。本研究的结果将加深我们对东青藏高原古环境演变的理解。
methodsCn: 研究的区域为XS剖面（99°59′E，31°37′N），位于甘孜县西北部，海拔3400米（m）以上。通过将不锈钢管锤入新鲜露头的地层边界附近，采集了五个用于光释光（OSL）定年的样本。为了后续测量古环境代理，按2.5厘米间隔收集了散装样本。对于在1米、3米和5米深度处采集的样本，纯化了中等粒径的石英颗粒（38–63微米）以进行OSL定年，准备方法遵循Lai等（2007）的研究。使用中国科学院山地灾害与环境研究所的Lexsyg研究自动TL/OSL读数器，采用标准单个样品再生剂量协议进行了石英OSL定年。对于深度为7.5米和10米的两个底部样本，石英发光信号接近饱和，这可能导致样本年龄的低估。因此，使用兰州大学的自动Risø TL/OSL读数器对富钾长石的粗颗粒进行了后红外（IR）–红外刺激发光（SL）（pIR–IRSL）定年。土壤δ13Corg测量在兰州大学草地农业生态系统国家重点实验室（SKLGAE）进行。在测量之前，所有空气干燥的黄土样本在去除现代根系后被研磨成均匀的粉末（>200目）。约3克的亚样本用10%的盐酸（HCl）处理24小时，以完全去除无机碳，然后在用蒸馏水彻底冲洗后，在40°C下烘干。随后，称取3–5毫克的亚样本放入锡杯中进行分析。总有机碳（TOC）和磁化率（MS）测量在兰州大学西部环境系统重点实验室进行。扩散反射光谱（DRS）在中国科学院地球环境研究所（西安）进行测量。
findingsCn: 在冰川期，黄土的δ13Corg值低于间冰期，冷阶段的值比上一个间冰期（LIG）更为负值。根据δ13Corg数据重建的植被表明，C3/C4混合植被以C3植被为主，而在冰川阶段C4植被的相对丰度远低于MIS 5和MIS 3期间。MIS 5和MIS 3期间C4植物的高相对丰度表明在温暖期C4植物的比例增加。自LIG以来，甘孜地区C3/C4植被丰度的变化主要受到冰川-间冰川尺度气候变化的控制。温度、降水和大气CO2的综合作用导致了东藏高原古植被的变化。

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method used to measure the stable carbon isotope composition (δ13Corg) in loess-paleosol sequences?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个用于测量黄土-古土壤序列中稳定碳同位素组成（δ13Corg）的数据收集方法的示例？
Example.AnswerEn: The soil δ13Corg measurements were conducted at the State Key Laboratory of Grassland Agro-ecosystems (SKLGAE), Lanzhou University. Before measurement, all air-dried loess samples were ground into a uniform size powder (>200 mesh) after removal of modern rootlets. Subsamples of ~3 g were treated with 10% hydrochloric acid (HCl) for 24 h to remove inorganic carbon completely and then oven-dried at 40 °C after thorough rinsing with distilled water. Subsequently, 3–5 mg subsamples were weighed and placed in a tin cup for analysis.
Example.AnswerCn: 土壤δ13Corg测量在兰州大学草地农业生态系统国家重点实验室（SKLGAE）进行。在测量之前，所有空气干燥的黄土样品在去除现代根系后被研磨成均匀的粉末（>200目）。约3克的子样用10%的盐酸（HCl）处理24小时，以完全去除无机碳，然后在用蒸馏水彻底冲洗后，在40°C的烘箱中烘干。随后，称取3-5毫克的子样，放入锡杯中进行分析。

Example.QuestionEn: Please provide an example of a technique used to date loess sequences and its challenges.
Example.QuestionCn: 请提供一个用于测定黄土序列年代的技术示例及其挑战。
Example.AnswerEn: Optically stimulated luminescence (OSL) dating was used for quartz grains, with medium quartz grains (38–63 μm) purified and prepared following specific methods. For samples where the quartz luminescence signal was close to saturation, post-infrared (IR)–IR stimulated luminescence (SL) (pIR–IRSL) dating on coarse grains of K-rich feldspar was conducted. The challenge with the quartz luminescence signal being close to saturation could lead to the underestimation of the ages of the samples.
Example.AnswerCn: 光刺激发光（OSL）定年用于石英颗粒，采用特定方法对中等粒径的石英颗粒（38–63 μm）进行纯化和制备。对于那些石英发光信号接近饱和的样品，进行了钾富含长石粗颗粒的后红外（IR）–红外刺激发光（SL）定年（pIR–IRSL）。石英发光信号接近饱和的挑战可能导致样品年龄的低估。

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of how magnetic susceptibility data is collected and its relevance in studying loess sequences?

Example.AnswerEn: Magnetic susceptibility (MS) measurements were carried out using a Bartington MS2 magnetic susceptibility meter. These measurements are relevant as they help in understanding the magnetic properties of loess sequences, which are important for reconstructing past environmental and climatic conditions on the Tibetan Plateau.
Example.AnswerCn: 磁性易感性（MS）测量是使用Bartington MS2磁性易感性计进行的。这些测量是相关的，因为它们有助于理解黄土序列的磁性特性，这对于重建青藏高原的过去环境和气候条件非常重要。

Definition.QuestionEn: What is the meaning of 'δ13Corg composition' in the context of paleoclimate studies?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在古气候研究中，“δ13Corg 组成”的含义是什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: The δ13Corg composition refers to the stable carbon isotope composition of soil organic matter, which is closely related to vegetation and soil pedogenic processes. It is used as a tool to understand the component processes of the terrestrial carbon cycle and to reconstruct past environments and paleoecology.
Definition.AnswerCn: δ13Corg 组成指的是土壤有机质的稳定碳同位素组成，这与植被和土壤成土过程密切相关。它被用作理解陆地碳循环的组成过程以及重建过去环境和古生态的工具。

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'pIR–IRSL dating on coarse grains of K-rich feldspar' entail in the context of geochronology?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在地质年代学的背景下，“对富钾长石粗颗粒进行pIR–IRSL测年”涉及什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: The pIR–IRSL dating on coarse grains of K-rich feldspar involves using post-infrared infrared stimulated luminescence techniques to date sediment samples. This method is particularly used when quartz luminescence signals are close to saturation, providing alternative age estimations for geological samples.
Definition.AnswerCn: K-rich 长石粗颗粒的 pIR–IRSL 定年涉及使用后红外-红外刺激发光技术对沉积样本进行定年。当石英发光信号接近饱和时，这种方法特别适用于提供地质样本的替代年龄估计。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do the magnetic susceptibility measurement techniques compare to the methods used for δ13Corg analysis in terms of equipment and procedures?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 磁化率测量技术与δ13Corg分析方法在设备和程序方面的比较如何？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Magnetic susceptibility measurements utilize the Bartington MS2 magnetic susceptibility meter, while δ13Corg analysis employs the MAT-253 isotope ratio mass spectrometer. Magnetic susceptibility is measured at 2.5 cm intervals and involves non-destructive magnetic measurements, whereas δ13Corg analysis requires chemical treatment of samples to remove inorganic carbon before isotope measurement.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 磁化率测量使用Bartington MS2磁化率计，而δ13Corg分析则采用MAT-253同位素比质谱仪。磁化率以2.5厘米的间隔进行测量，涉及非破坏性的磁性测量，而δ13Corg分析则需要对样品进行化学处理，以去除无机碳后再进行同位素测量。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How can variations in δ13Corg values observed in loess-paleosol sequences be interpreted to reflect past environmental changes in the Tibetan Plateau?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 在黄土-古土壤序列中观察到的δ13Corg值的变化如何被解释为反映青藏 Plateau 过去的环境变化？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Variations in δ13Corg values in loess-paleosol sequences can indicate changes in vegetation types and environmental conditions on the Tibetan Plateau. More positive δ13Corg values in paleosols compared to loess deposits suggest shifts in dominant vegetation, possibly driven by climate factors such as temperature and precipitation. These variations reflect the influence of glacial and interglacial periods on paleovegetation.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 在黄土-古土壤序列中，δ13Corg值的变化可以指示青藏高原植被类型和环境条件的变化。古土壤中较正的δ13Corg值相较于黄土沉积物，表明主导植被的变化，可能是由气候因素如温度和降水驱动的。这些变化反映了冰川期和间冰期对古植被的影响。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes the need for different data collection intervals when measuring magnetic susceptibility and organic carbon in loess-paleosol sequences?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在测量黄土-古土壤序列中的磁 susceptibility 和有机碳时，导致需要不同数据收集间隔的原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The need for different data collection intervals is caused by the specific characteristics and research objectives associated with each type of data. Magnetic susceptibility and grain size data are measured at more frequent intervals (2.5 cm) to capture fine-scale variations, while total organic carbon and isotopic measurements are taken at larger intervals (10 cm and 20 cm) due to their relatively stable nature over larger spans.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 不同数据收集间隔的需求是由每种数据的特定特征和研究目标所导致的。磁敏感性和粒度数据以更频繁的间隔（2.5厘米）进行测量，以捕捉细微的变化，而总有机碳和同位素测量则以较大的间隔（10厘米和20厘米）进行，因为它们在较大范围内相对稳定。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why is it important to use multiple types of instruments for measuring magnetic and optical data in the analysis of loess-paleosol sequences?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在分析黄土-古土壤序列时，使用多种类型的仪器来测量磁性和光学数据的重要性是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Using multiple types of instruments is important because it allows for a comprehensive analysis of different properties of the material. Instruments like the Bartington MS2 for magnetic susceptibility and the CM-700d spectrophotometer for colorimetry provide specific insights into the magnetic and optical properties, respectively, which are crucial for understanding the environmental and climatic conditions reflected in the loess-paleosol sequences.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 使用多种仪器是重要的，因为它可以对材料的不同特性进行全面分析。像Bartington MS2这样的磁敏感度仪和CM-700d分光光度计这样的色度仪分别提供了对磁性和光学特性的具体见解，这对于理解反映在黄土-古土壤序列中的环境和气候条件至关重要。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the choice of using quartz OSL dating and pIR-IRSL dating methods in paleoenvironmental studies of the Tibetan Plateau?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在青藏高原的古环境研究中，选择使用石英光释光（OSL）定年和后红外光释光（pIR-IRSL）定年方法的因素有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The choice between quartz OSL dating and pIR-IRSL dating methods is influenced by the characteristics of the samples and the depth of the sediment layers. Quartz OSL is typically used when medium quartz grains are available and suitable for dating, while pIR-IRSL is chosen for deeper layers or when quartz luminescence signals approach saturation, as it helps avoid age underestimation in such conditions.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 选择石英OSL定年和pIR-IRSL定年方法受到样本特征和沉积层深度的影响。当有适合定年的中等石英颗粒时，通常使用石英OSL；而在较深的层位或当石英发光信号接近饱和时，则选择pIR-IRSL，以帮助避免在这种情况下的年龄低估。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the objectives behind conducting detailed δ13Corg and total organic carbon analyses in loess sequences on the eastern Tibetan Plateau?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在东藏高原的黄土序列中进行详细的δ13Corg和总有机碳分析的目的是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The objectives are to understand the variation characteristics of loess δ13Corg values during the last glacial–interglacial cycle and its environmental implications, deepening the understanding of the evolution of the paleoenvironment on the eastern Tibetan Plateau.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 目标是了解在最后一个冰川-间冰期循环中黄土δ13Corg值的变化特征及其环境意义，深化对东藏高原古环境演变的理解。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it significant to measure paleoenvironment proxies at specific intervals in loess-paleosol sequences?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在黄土-古土壤序列中以特定间隔测量古环境代理的重要性是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Measuring paleoenvironment proxies at specific intervals, such as 2.5 cm for bulk samples, allows for detailed analysis of environmental changes over time, helping to reconstruct past environments and understand the paleoecology, particularly in regions like the Tibetan Plateau.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 在特定间隔（如2.5厘米）测量古环境代理（paleoenvironment proxies）可以对环境变化进行详细分析，帮助重建过去的环境并理解古生态，特别是在像青藏高原这样的地区。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What instrumental techniques are employed to measure magnetic properties and grain size in loess samples?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在测量黄土样品的磁性特性和颗粒大小时，采用了哪些仪器技术？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Magnetic susceptibility is measured using a Bartington MS2 magnetic susceptibility meter, while grain size data is determined using a Malvern Mastersizer 2000 laser particle size analyzer. Additionally, non-hysteretic remanent magnetization is measured using ASCIM-10-30 pulse magnetometers and Molspin Minispin magnetometers.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 磁化率使用Bartington MS2磁化率计测量，而颗粒大小数据则使用Malvern Mastersizer 2000激光粒度分析仪确定。此外，非滞后剩余磁化率使用ASCIM-10-30脉冲磁力计和Molspin Minispin磁力计进行测量。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What technologies are used to enable the precise measurement of magnetic susceptibility and grain size in loess-paleosol sequences on the Tibetan Plateau?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 用于精确测量青藏 Plateau 上黄土-古土壤序列中的磁化率和颗粒大小的技术有哪些？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Magnetic susceptibility is measured using a Bartington MS2 magnetic susceptibility meter, and grain size data is obtained using a Malvern Mastersizer 2000 laser particle size analyzer.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 磁化率使用Bartington MS2磁化率计测量，颗粒大小数据则使用Malvern Mastersizer 2000激光粒度分析仪获得。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How do isotopic ratio mass spectrometers facilitate the analysis of stable carbon isotopes in soil organic matter?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 同位素比质谱仪如何促进土壤有机质中稳定碳同位素的分析？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The MAT-253 isotope ratio mass spectrometer is used to measure the δ13Corg of samples, allowing for detailed analysis of stable carbon isotopes in soil organic matter.
Enablement.AnswerCn: MAT-253同位素比质谱仪用于测量样品的δ13Corg，从而对土壤有机质中的稳定碳同位素进行详细分析。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What methodologies enable the dating of loess deposits in the eastern Tibetan Plateau using optically stimulated luminescence (OSL) techniques?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些方法学可以利用光释光（OSL）技术对东藏高原的黄土沉积物进行定年？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Quartz OSL dating is performed using a standard single aliquot regenerative-dose protocol with the Lexsyg research automatic TL/OSL reader, and post-infrared (IR)–IR stimulated luminescence (SL) dating on coarse grains of K-rich feldspar is conducted using an automated Risø TL/OSL reader.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 石英OSL测年采用标准的单颗粒再生剂量协议，使用Lexsyg研究自动TL/OSL读数仪进行；而对富钾长石粗颗粒进行后红外（IR）–红外刺激发光（SL）测年，则使用自动Risø TL/OSL读数仪。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might the expected relationship between δ13Corg values and glacial-interglacial periods be different in various regions, and how can data collection methods account for these differences?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 为什么在不同地区之间，δ13Corg值与冰期-间冰期周期之间的预期关系可能会有所不同，数据收集方法如何能够解释这些差异？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The δ13Corg values exhibit different patterns in various regions due to factors like regional climate influences, vegetation types, and soil processes. Data collection methods that consider these regional characteristics, such as using multiple environmental proxies and detailed δ13Corg analysis, can help account for these differences.
Expectation.AnswerCn: δ13Corg 值在不同地区表现出不同的模式，这与区域气候影响、植被类型和土壤过程等因素有关。考虑到这些区域特征的数据收集方法，例如使用多种环境代理和详细的 δ13Corg 分析，可以帮助解释这些差异。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What is your evaluation of the effectiveness of the data collection methods used for stable carbon isotope analyses in understanding past environmental conditions on the Tibetan Plateau?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 您对用于稳定碳同位素分析的数据收集方法在理解青藏高原过去环境条件方面的有效性有何评估？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The data collection methods for stable carbon isotope analyses, such as detailed δ13Corg and total organic carbon measurements, are effective in reconstructing past environmental conditions on the Tibetan Plateau. These methods, when combined with other environmental proxies, provide valuable insights into the variation characteristics of loess δ13Corg values during different climatic periods, thereby enhancing our understanding of paleoenvironmental changes.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 稳定碳同位素分析的数据收集方法，如详细的δ13Corg和总有机碳测量，对于重建青藏高原的过去环境条件非常有效。这些方法与其他环境代理相结合，提供了关于不同气候时期黄土δ13Corg值变化特征的宝贵见解，从而增强了我们对古环境变化的理解。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: In your opinion, what are the potential avenues for expanding datasets related to magnetic susceptibility and diffuse reflectance spectra in loess-paleosol research?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在你看来，扩展与黄土-古土壤研究相关的磁化率和漫反射光谱数据集的潜在途径有哪些？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Potential avenues for expanding datasets in this research area include increasing the spatial coverage of sampling sites across different regions of the Tibetan Plateau to capture diverse environmental conditions. Additionally, integrating these datasets with other geological and climatic proxies could provide a more comprehensive understanding of environmental changes over time. Technological advancements in measurement instruments could also enhance the precision and scope of data collection.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 在这一研究领域，扩展数据集的潜在途径包括增加对不同地区的采样点的空间覆盖，以捕捉多样的环境条件。此外，将这些数据集与其他地质和气候代理整合，可以提供对环境变化的更全面理解。测量仪器的技术进步也可以提高数据收集的精确性和范围。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't understand how the δ13Corg values are used to reconstruct past environments and what makes them a reliable indicator in this context.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白δ13Corg值是如何用于重建过去环境的，以及在这个背景下它们为什么是可靠的指标。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The δ13Corg composition of soil organic matter is closely related to vegetation and soil pedogenic processes. It is influenced by environmental conditions and vegetation types, making it a valuable indicator for reconstructing past environments and paleoecology, as shown in various regions including the Chinese Loess Plateau and the Tibetan Plateau.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 土壤有机质的δ13Corg组成与植被和土壤成土过程密切相关。它受到环境条件和植被类型的影响，使其成为重建过去环境和古生态的重要指标，正如在中国黄土高原和青藏高原等多个地区所示。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I'm unsure about the methodology used for dating loess samples and why certain dating techniques are chosen over others.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我对用于测定黄土样本年代的方法感到不确定，以及为什么选择某些测年技术而不是其他技术。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Optically stimulated luminescence (OSL) and post-infrared (IR)–IR stimulated luminescence (SL) dating techniques are used based on the characteristics of the samples. Medium quartz grains and K-rich feldspar are used for OSL and pIR–IRSL dating respectively, as they provide reliable age estimation considering the luminescence signal saturation issues in some samples.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 光刺激发光（OSL）和后红外（IR）–红外刺激发光（SL）测年技术是根据样品的特性使用的。中等粒径的石英颗粒和富钾的长石用于OSL和pIR–IRSL测年，因为它们在考虑到某些样品的发光信号饱和问题时，提供了可靠的年龄估计。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't make sense of how different environmental proxies are combined to interpret the paleoenvironmental conditions on the Tibetan Plateau.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法理解如何将不同的环境代理结合起来，以解释青藏高原的古环境条件。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Environmental proxies such as δ13Corg values, total organic carbon, and magnetic susceptibility are measured at high-resolution intervals and combined with data from diffuse reflectance spectra to infer past climate conditions, vegetation types, and changes over glacial–interglacial cycles, providing a comprehensive view of paleoenvironmental conditions.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 环境代理如δ13Corg值、总有机碳和磁化率在高分辨率间隔内进行测量，并与漫反射光谱数据结合，以推断过去的气候条件、植被类型以及冰川-间冰期循环的变化，从而提供对古环境条件的全面视角。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please summarize the methods used for collecting and analyzing the δ13Corg and total organic carbon data in loess sequences.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 总结用于收集和分析黄土序列中δ13Corg和总有机碳数据的方法。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The soil δ13Corg measurements were conducted at the State Key Laboratory of Grassland Agro-ecosystems, Lanzhou University. After air-drying the loess samples, they were ground into uniform size powder (>200 mesh) after removal of modern rootlets. Subsamples of approximately 3 g were treated with 10% hydrochloric acid (HCl) for 24 hours to remove inorganic carbon completely and then oven-dried at 40°C after thorough rinsing with distilled water. Subsequently, 3–5 mg subsamples were weighed and placed in a tin cup for analysis. Total organic carbon (TOC) measurements were carried out at the Key Laboratory of Western China’s Environmental Systems, Ministry of Education, Lanzhou University.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 土壤δ13Corg测量在兰州大学草地农业生态系统国家重点实验室进行。将黄土样品空气干燥后，去除现代根系后研磨成均匀的粉末（>200目）。约3克的子样用10%的盐酸（HCl）处理24小时，以完全去除无机碳，然后在用蒸馏水彻底冲洗后，在40°C的烘箱中干燥。随后，称取3-5毫克的子样，放入锡杯中进行分析。总有机碳（TOC）测量在兰州大学西部环境系统教育部重点实验室进行。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please identify potential datasets that can complement the understanding of paleoenvironmental changes in the Tibetan Plateau.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请识别潜在的数据集，以补充对青藏高原古环境变化的理解。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The dataset contains information on magnetic data, grain size, colorimetry data, diffuse reflectance spectra, and stable carbon isotope data from loess-paleosol sequences on the eastern Tibetan Plateau. This data provides insights into magnetic properties and color variations, which play a crucial role in understanding past environments and climate dynamics in the region.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 该数据集包含来自东藏高原黄土-古土壤序列的磁性数据、粒度、色度数据、漫反射光谱和稳定碳同位素数据的信息。这些数据提供了对磁性特性和颜色变化的洞察，这在理解该地区的过去环境和气候动态中起着至关重要的作用。
